title: Single file
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Gil Brealey and Robert Kingsbury
brief_description: Illustrates the problems concerned when a file is misplaced in an office situation - intended as training for public service employees, but is applicable in any office. Shows the worry and concern caused by inefficient methods of work, clutter, lack of interest and poor organisation in loaning, distributing and return of files.
